name: Forgiveness
detailed_description:
WARNING: THIS GAME CONTAINS FLASHING LIGHTS

Forgiveness is an escape room puzzle game themed on the seven deadly sins, with psychological horror elements that change based on a personality test.
*The game DO NOT contain any jump scares*

The Story


After committing a terrible sin "God" is testing your worth on his world and putting you to the test. When first playing the game you'll be taking a personality test to determine your sin. You wake up in an empty room taken by Dr. Benjamin Smith, or as he likes to call himself "God".
The only question left is will you get your punishment or forgiveness?

Gameplay


The gameplay is based on the personality test the player takes at the start of the game, The puzzles, room design, and the environment are changed.




The puzzles are extremely challenging, and you can choose to play on either normal or extreme difficulty, the normal difficulty gives the player subtle clues and there is not any time limit, on the other hand, extreme difficulty is the player by himself for a 30 min time limit in the room, you either escape the room in time or face the consequences. You can examine almost every item in the room, pick it up and sometimes use it to help you solve the puzzles.

Environment


All of the rooms are indoors but adapts to your sin, you will have to explore the room to find out clues and puzzles you have to solve,
every sin has his own unique puzzles and room design to fit the player. You can't fight back so you will have to play along with "God's" test

Our Policy About The Game


We ♥ Youtubers
Same goes for articles, blogs, memes, we love them all
Linking the game's store page is not a requirement but we sure love it if you do :)
(The only thing we are not allowing is taking credit over the creation of the game)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (2011 or newer)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 / AMD Radeon HD 5750. OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
